name: Crowned Heads - The Lost Angel - TAA 2022
additionalNotes: A medium-strength cigar with a spicy, earthy and sweetness profile. Its dark red Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper cloaks an Ecuadorian binder and Dominican and Nicaraguan filler leaves. Handmade at the Tabacalera Pichardo Factory in Nicaragua, the Crowned Heads The Lost Angel TAA 2022 is a line extension to the Angel’s Anvil brand.
